00014 // Load and compile a shader.  |type| can be one of GL_VERTEX_SHADER or
00015 // GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER.  Returns a non-0 value representing the compiled
00016 // shader on success, 0 on failure.  The caller is responsible for deleting
00017 // the returned shader using glDeleteShader().
